item.title: About Me
item.description: Iâ€™m a DevOps engineer / sysadmin, tech and open source enthusiast by day and amateur photographer and traveler in my spare time. I also 3d print and build/repair/break stuff regularly in my garage. Sysadmin then DevOps engineer, probabbly doing DevOps before it was fashionable to be called that.
